content: i find this pattern to be my perfect gift hat it goes well with special textured or handspun skeins although any yarn of the right weight would be suitable i ve named it anrheg because that is the welsh word for gift and made it free because so that it is also a gift to all knitters who might want to make it this pattern needs a single skein of dk or worsted weight yarn this should also provide enough to make a pom pom in most cases sizes adult small medium large to fit head size 20 22 24
